programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Rupert And The Beehive - During a big thunderstorm in Nutwood, the swarm of bees lose their home. Bill badger attempts to reconstruct their hive with the help of his tool box but unfortunately it falls to pieces. With another thunderstorm looming, will the bees get a new home in time?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Bird - Rupert is off to join his friends in the wood, where he learns that Raggety has just heard the most extraordinary bird-song - from presumably an unusual bird. What is it doing in Nutwood? Bill learns that many birds migrate from the Far South to spend the summer in the Far Far North. The unusual visitor must have been doing so but got lost and cut off from its flock. Rupert determines that they should help the lost bird on its way. Thanks to Ming and Rupert's car, they are finally able to do so...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep47
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Games - Raa Raa is in a playful mood and sets off to find his friends. Together they incorporate everybody's game, to make one noisy, fun filled new game.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep48
programme.desc: Raa Raa Can Do It - Raa Raa is in an overly helpful mood and his other friends start to feel excluded… will Raa Raa realise the error of his ways and let the others help too?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy'S Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep13
programme.desc: Fleshed Out / Messy Business At The Manor - Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep76
programme.desc: Uncharted Regions - As Honerva attempts to continues to put her plan in motion the Voltron Coalitions splits up to stop her. With success within reach Honerva unleashes her deadliest mech yet.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save A Sleepwalking Bear - The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Night of the Disco Lights - Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Fired Up! - When Blaze smells smoke at Axle City’s garage, he calmly and courageously leads his friends outside to safety. Axle City’s fire chief is impressed with Blaze’s courage and thinks maybe he has what it takes to be a fire fighter.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Jungle Horn - Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships / The Pirate Parade - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Dragons N' Roses! - When Agnes the Dragon moves to the Kingdom of Roses, everyone is afraid of her fearsome roar! Everyone except Zooli, who befriends Agnes and shows her friends how lovable Agnes really is!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep615
programme.desc: The Boingies! - When a bunch of adorable critters called Boingies get lost in Axle City, it's up to Blaze and AJ to gather them up and get them home safe and sound.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep302

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119

programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep135

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep20
programme.desc: Pyjamas - Dee encourages a friend to say 'pyjamas' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today, we see lots of different pyjamas - pink pyjamas, striped pyjamas, spotty pyjamas and banana pyjamas.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep75
programme.desc: Band Together - Mayor Sho-Po is planning a parade but threatens to call it off when the Blockers can't play and march together at the same time!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: It's Time to go Swimming - JoJo and Gran Gran go swimming in a lido on a hot summer day. JoJo is excited to show Gran Gran what she has learnt in her recent swimming lessons.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: I Am Monty - Monty doesn't think he is similar to anyone else in his family and wonders whether everyone in a family should be alike.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: The Incredible Kazoops - Monty discovers he is the only one in the family who can't whistle, but wonders if with practice you can perfect anything.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: The Scarecrow Badge - Tag, Betty, Happy and Norrie help Duggee to build an enormous robot scarecrow whilst Roly keeps a careful watch on the birds.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt Badge - The squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby, but they must pass a sea monster and a giant snake to get to the treasure.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The Jam Badge - Duggee decides to make some jam with all his fruit, but just as he gets started Naughty Monkey steals the barrel of fruit and runs off with it.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic Ocean in a vintage plane.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: Solar Race: Australia - Glitch's hopes of winning a solar-powered race across the Australian outback are foiled when he crashes the Glitchster in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Daddy Putdown - When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Shaun - Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: Andy and The Bobcat - When Mr Hammond asks Andy to take pictures of a Bobcat, a wild cat that lives in North America, Andy jets off in his safari mobile and track one down.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: Useful Machines - In this episode, Grace gets to grips with three amazingly useful machines!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: Silent Sinker - Coconutty Raft and Swashbubbles are the games in store for Annaella, Raz, David and Jia Qin, as they try to win back Gem's jewels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Super Squirrel Badge - The squirrels decide they want to be super squirrels and find themselves special outfits and 'super' names.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: The Rescue Badge - Enid the cat gets stuck when she chases a mouse up a tree, so Duggee and the squirrels rescue her.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Summer Holiday Badge - The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a migrating bird fall from the sky - suitcase and all!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Middle of the World City: Ecuador - After hearing about how the Monument to the Equator is in the wrong location, Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters and move the monument onto the equator.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers - When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's loyal Grimbots steal the pole's marker to help Glitch win.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep14
programme.desc: Emily's Winter Party Special - It is wintertime on Sodor and there is going to be a Winter Festival at the Town Square. The Fat Controller tells the engines that he will choose the most helpful engine to be the party engine.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep30
programme.desc: Star Renovation - Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah can't find any of her favourite constellations...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep29
programme.desc: Lemon Cafe - Sarah & Duck discover a Lemon Cafe in the park, but it seems to be nearly closing time...

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: Sunset Picnic - Nelly and Nora want to enjoy a sunset picnic, but the annoying midges just won't leave them alone.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky, Lucky Me! - Lola thinks she's the luckiest person in the whole world, especially when her grandparents send her and Charlie the money to go and see a new film.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: The Thing That Talked Back - Bob and Tony lose Gwen in a canyon that makes their voices echo - how will they find her?

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: The Thing That Leapt High - Bob can't join in with Gwen and Tony's game but discovers he has different talents.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Asparagus - Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - they're not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyone's got a wild side.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Hair Badge - Duggee is having a bad hair day, so the squirrels and Norrie decide to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Cake Badge - The rabbits are very upset when Happy eats their cake, so Duggee decides to make them a new one with the help of the squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - When Tala bases her class project on her uncle's travels, the Go Jetters swing into action and help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across the continent of Europe.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project. When the pair get lost, the Go Jetters need to crack the clues and find them in this huge continent.

programme.title: The Numtums (S2) Ep21
programme.desc: The Drumtums - The Numpups form a band using old pans as drums, but how do they make music which doesn't sound like crashing and banging?!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep115
programme.desc: Where? There! - Laa-Laa and Po play a game of 'hide and seek'. They both take turns at hiding. Tinky Winky and Dispsy are hiding too and Laa-Laa and Po find them together.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep111
programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Señor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Daisy Chain Gang / Backdraft to School - Fendrich organizes a charity as a distraction while he attempts to steal the city deed. Sinclair gathers antiheroes to stop him. // Freya is one credit short of graduating from the fire academy and is suspended as Fire Chief.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Parker Gets the Bird / Anchor Shackleton - Parker tends to a small strawberry garden until its survival is threatened by a horde of ravenous birds. // Parker discovers Angus can't swim, but with the little nimbus' help, the sailor's on his way to becoming a buoy.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Dr. Zap vs Electroboy - Theodore is hit by lightning and believes he's like his comic book hero, until he's told he's actually a villain.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Mega Bounce Battle - The boys disobey Dave's orders to not play a dangerous game then have to hide their injuries when they get hurt.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Gossip Guy - The school newspaper has a sudden increase in sales when a gossip column appears poking fun at other students.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Chimpmania - Jeanette and the Chipmunks orchestrate a break-in at Bocarter's house to rescue a chimpanzee he keeps in a cage.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep222
programme.desc: New School Who Dis? - After Schwoz's experiment-gone-wrong causes an infestation at Sw.A.G, Danger Force enrolls at Swellview Junior High and stumbles into an extra-curricular crime wave.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Classified - G.H.O.S.T. Special Agent Schloder pursues Twitch after mistaking her for a Decepticon. Meanwhile, Dot is put through G.H.O.S.T. orientation, where she learns that her employer's intentions may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Terror Firma - Marooned on a deadly planet, the crew must work together with their captive Gwyn to stay alive.... except the planet isn't the only thing in pursuit.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep113
programme.desc: For Bros About to Rock / It's a Loud, Loud, Loud, Loud House - Lincoln is going to his first rock concert, and Luna is determined to make it the greatest experience ever. // Lincoln finds a letter in the attic leading him to believe there is money hidden within the Loud house!

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Catastrophe - When Nate is paired with Jenny on a school project, he hopes to prove his awesomeness to her, but his cat phobia threatens to destroy his cool. Meanwhile, Ellen sets out to cure Martin of a deeply ingrained phobia of his own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep118
programme.desc: Pets or Pests / Komputer Overload - SpongeBob adopts a stray worm, and to his surprise, the worm gives birth to some worm babies overnight! // Plankton is sick of Karen's criticisms, so he decides he can just replace her with some new computer inventions!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep101
programme.desc: House Fancy / Krabby Road - When Squidward sees Squilliam on a TV show about fancy homes, Squidward becomes infuriated and tries to outdo him. // When SpongeBob mistakenly thinks that Plankton is starting a band, Plankton decides to use this to his advantage.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep104
programme.desc: I Named It Whiskers / How Angus Got His Groove Back - After one of Lily's inventions goes haywire, she enlists Parker's help to get it back under control. // Angus loses his lucky beanie, which causes him to revert back to being a child.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep424
programme.desc: A Dark & Story Night / Sand Hassles - When the lights go out in the Loud House, the kids entertain themselves by taking turns telling parts of a story. // Lucy and the Morticians' Club try to thwart plans for a school field trip to the beach.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Boss Maybe / Family Bonding - Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter. // Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's suspicious new neighbors.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Dolores Moody / P.I.R.A.T.E. - Parker tries to cheer up the grouchiest woman on Mt. Middlemost-Dolores Moody. // Parker, Angus, and Russell must save the S.S. Steadfast from being taken by pirates.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Inside Russell / The Stinkhole Chronicles - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly. // Parker and Lily go on a quest through Old Stinkhole to rescue Angus.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep103
programme.desc: Spongicus / Suctioncup Symphony - Plankton has demolished the Chum Bucket! In its place, he has built a Roman coliseum. // The Bikini Bottom Symphony is accepting submissions for their composition contest, and Squidward is determined to win.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep104
programme.desc: Not Normal / Gone - When Squidward points out to SpongeBob that he's not normal, SpongeBob makes it his mission to become normal. // SpongeBob wakes up one morning to find that everyone in Bikini Bottom is gone - even Gary!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep106
programme.desc: A Life In A Day / Sun Bleached - Everyone is in awe of Larry the Lobster's daredevil ways, especially SpongeBob and Patrick. // Everybody who's anybody is going to a big party in Bikini Bottom, but you have to be a certain shade of tan to get in.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep107
programme.desc: Giant Squidward / No Nose Knows - When Squidward gets spritzed with plant growth spray, he becomes monstrously huge. // When Patrick realizes that he is the only one out of all his friends without a nose, he decides he needs to get a nose, too.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Shifu's Ex - When Shifu's ex-girlfriend, Mei Ling, visits the Jade Palace, Po decides to try and get them back together, despite the fact Mei Ling is now Shifu's most hated enemy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Shoot the Messenger - Po and Tigress must track down and stop a messenger from delivering a scroll that could thrust China into all-out war!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Avatar Day - Aang must clear up a wave of anti-Avatar sentiment and atone for something he did in the past.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Love Hurts - Private is smitten with the zoo nurse. The only way he can see her is if he gets injured.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Loathe at First Sight / The Trouble with Jiggles - Kowalski's obsession with Doris the dolphin drives him to invent a love ray, the Love-U-Laser. // Told as a courtroom flashback, Kowalski unwisely revives Jiggles in a small, whipped cream-eating version.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Hair Apparent / Love Takes Flightless - The Commissioner flips his lid. His toupee blows off and sticks to Maurice, who also gets red cheeks and a skinned tail, all by accident. // Shelly the ostrich gets stuck in drying cement and only Rico can save her.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Robot Arms / PB & J - Buhdeuce gets robot arms to help him mine bread, but he ends up having to use them to help everyone else out instead. // The guys adopt a Ponda Bear, who seems like a cute, sweet pet... but he's actually quite the opposite.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Brendar the Barbarian - Brendar, kicked out of the Royal Order of Warrior Princesses, is left as a "feared and revered" Barbarian. Troll Evan is an aspiring musician who burns his own bridge and convinces Brendar to bring him on her quest to defeat an evil demon.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Dorg and the Very Special Flower / Dorg Sells Cookies - Sick of caring for Fretta's favorite flower, Dorg and the gang cast a spell to keep it out of their hair. // Dorg wants to win the top prize for selling Adventure Club cookies.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Winky / Trivial Per Hoot - Felicity is overwhelmed by the responsibility of owning her first pet, a cute but mischievous creature called a Winky. // Athena loses her confidence when, for the first time ever, she gets a fact about Mythlandia wrong.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Brett Venom, M.D. / Laughquake - Sanjay and Craig infiltrate the hospital to see the world’s first butt transplant. // Sanjay and Craig go on a quest to find the ultimate laugh.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep116
programme.desc: The Chosening / Crush It Ollie - When Ollie blames Wowski for not prepping him for a Chosen One test, they have a falling out. // When Ollie is paired with Ivy for a science class project, he tries to shake his slacker image to impress her.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Eyes on the Prize / Battle of the Stands - Fanboy and Chum Chum desperately want to find a rare cereal box toy. So they go to Oz for guidance and training. // Fanboy and Chum Chum start a lemonade stand, but soon realize Lupe and Yo have a stand of their own... right across the street!

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Guard Dog / Dog Save the Queen - When the Chameleon witnesses Snaptrap committing a crime, he agrees to testify against him, and Dudley has to keep him save. // Dudley has to assist the British Undercover Force B.U.F.F. to prevent a Crown Jewel thievery.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Bloomix Power - The Winx train in Aisha's new gym to prepare to fight without powers. Afterward, they return to Lynphea to fight the Treants and a flying Cloudtower. Flora saves her sister Miele, and gains her new transformation Bloomix!

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Golden Auditorium - Aisha and Stella work together as the Winx defeat the Treants, and earn their new Bloomix Power. Later, the Winx and Daphne tour the Golden Auditorium where they come face to face with a group of not-so-melodic sprites!

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Purple Jacket / Pizza Pit - An evil tech club lures Donnie with the promise of a gorgeous purple jacket. // It's Pizza Week, the greatest week of the year, but the Turtles' favorite pizza joints keep getting taken out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: Patnocchio / ChefBob - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep243
programme.desc: The Nitwitting / The Ballad of Filthy Muck - Patrick inducts SpongeBob into his prestigious society of dullards and doofuses. // Patrick takes his grime to a new extreme, playing around in so much trash that he becomes unrecognizable.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pirates Life - When pirates show up at the house, the boys do all they can to protect a treasure chest that arrived for Dave.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep406
programme.desc: World Record - The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete to set a world record in hopes of winning a new virtual reality game.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Tour Bus - When Alvin talks Dave into buying a used tour bus, Dave has no idea of the problems ahead.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tooth Hurts / The Middlemost Toast - Parker accidentally loses one of Russell's teeth and hurries to find a replacement before Angus finds out. // On Free Toast Day at the Middlemost Toast, Parker does whatever it takes to make sure Angus enjoys the holiday.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232

programme.title: Anugerah Bolasepak Kebangsaan 2022 (ABK22)
programme.desc: ABK22 - Anugerah Bolasepak Kebangsaan (ABK 2022): Upacara menyampaikan Anugerah kepada pemain dan jurulatih di atas persembahan yang telah mereka pamerkan sepanjang musim 2022. 16 kategori anugerah telah dinilai penuh terperinci oleh ahli panel pemilih yang terdiri daripada kumpulan individu berwibawa, termasuk bekas pemain, jurulatih serta di kalangan ahli2 industri dalam bolasepak tempatan. Jangan ketinggalan merasai debarannya untuk mengetahui siapakah yang terbaik di kalangan yang terbaik bagi musim 2022!

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night : Cannonier vs Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Top 10 middleweights collide on December 18, as Jared Cannonier faces off with Sean Strickland in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the Amway Center in Orlando, Florida. One of the hardest punchers in the sport, pound-for-pound, Cannonier is well aware that a big win this fall will put him back in the title conversation at 185 pounds, but he will have to dig deep to get it against a fellow elite striker in Strickland, who has won six of his last seven matchups.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night : Cannonier vs Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Top 10 middleweights collide on December 18, as Jared Cannonier faces off with Sean Strickland in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the Amway Center in Orlando, Florida. One of the hardest punchers in the sport, pound-for-pound, Cannonier is well aware that a big win this fall will put him back in the title conversation at 185 pounds, but he will have to dig deep to get it against a fellow elite striker in Strickland, who has won six of his last seven matchups.
